website_summaries.verdict: Big, effective, and rolls from destination to destination with ease.
pros: Configured to move easily from place to place
Reports suggest that this jug keeps ice frozen for nearly two days
Big in size and big in results
cons: Be mindful that the lid may not always secure tightly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy online!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this, and made the mistake of waiting to test it. The water spigot is broken AND leaks everywhere. Also the cooler leaks from the top when you have it filled to the 5 gallon mark. What is the point of having wheels and a handle if you can’t actually use them? This product gets 2 stars because it it only works as a cooler...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like Crazy
customer_reviews.text: OK; I read the other reviews and figured 'how bad can it be?' It's truly bad. Bought for sports team, like the idea of handles and wheel. First game; filled it up and rolled it to the car. It leaked from the top lid as soon as it's tilted in any direction. And not just a few drops - epic leaking. Brought it to the game; left puddles of water in care even tho strapped in. Left a trail of water from car to sideline. It only won't leak if its filled up halfway, which is like a 2.5 Gal water cooler! Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: rebus

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and nonfunctional parts
customer_reviews.text: The rolling wheels are for decorative purposes only. The plastic wheels are assembled so tight that I could barely turn them. It’s a shame that it has a sticker saying the product is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS THINGS COLD FOR DAYS
customer_reviews.text: The Igloo Sport Roller Beverage Cooler (Majestic Blue, 5-Gallon, is the best cooler our family has had. And since I am 78, we have had a lot. I wish we had this years ago when camping. It keeps food and drinks colder than any cooler we have had. In the heat of this summer, with temperatures in the 95-99 range, it keep our drinks cold for 48 hours. Amazingly, the ice keeps thing freezing cold. It is so easy to roll around. When empty it can be picked up with one hand. I have encouraged my children and grand-children to buy one for the beach and camping. Well worth having. PEACE and enjoy the day. Margaret Bell-Berman
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Bell

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but certainly a flawed design
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our soccer team. It's nice but certainly a flawed design. Liquid does slosh out from the top requiring a max of 2/3rds full at best. The roller is reasonable on smooth concrete, mediocre on rough concrete, and useless in grass or gravel. And the top latch is not very sturdy and broke off within 3 weeks. Regardless, we made good use of it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Well worth owning.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for work. On asphalt crew and keep in my big box truck. I pull it out and roll it around when I'm m doing traffic control or flagging. Bottom line its in and out drug around and not handled gingerly. 1st one lasted 3yrs then front snap latch broke. Screwed a couple snap hinges on either side and used that 2 more yrs. Decided to buy a new one, not because the other didn't work anymore. Replaced it because the guys kept busting my chops for being too cheap to buy a new one :)
customer_reviews.author: Greg Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Would like it if it didn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: It leaks badly from the top! My kid asked for this cooler for Christmas so all the neighborhood kids could stay at the park longer. Great concept but poor execution. If anyone has done a modification to fix this please let me know! It’s outside the return window or else I would have done it. Only used twice. Very disappointed with Igloo.
customer_reviews.author: Coco02467

customer_reviews.title: stays cold
customer_reviews.text: It holds 5 gallons, but if you are going to tilt it back to roll it only do 4 cause at full it will leak as you roll.3 gallons drink/ one bag ice. Wheels are hard plastic so the are great on asphalt but ok on grass. Handle doesn't seem sturdy at first but it has held up like a champ under the weight no problem. left the ice and drink in overnight in Georgia heat and it still had ice the next day at 3 when being cleaned. For the price even if you don't want or need the wheels this thing is perfect compared to screw on lid ones at 70 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. I love that it has wheels and that i can use it with ice for house juice boxes or that I can fill it with my filtered water for drinking. I bought this for camping and look forward to using it. It is very well made and light to carry when empty. The closure on the lid might result in issues in the future but as of now it works fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Sprecher

customer_reviews.title: It's really great except do not tip it in the trunk if full
customer_reviews.text: I love this water holder, the "faucet" part works great, the lock at the top is nice..but it is not tight enough to tip sideways in your trunk if you are driving somewhere. I couldn't believe it, I mean a water container should be water tight. It works nicely on my RV countertop. The pull bar handle works nicely and the wheels roll well..I give it 4 out of 5, 5 if it had not leaked in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves it! It seems sturdy and we can now take a lot of water down a steep hill to the lake without a lot of effort. It has a great capacity and after 48 hours the water was still ice cold! I like that the spout is raised up so you can easily fit a cup underneath no matter where the cooler is placed. Only thing that would make this better is a mesh bag on the side to stick empty cups in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good performance
customer_reviews.text: I get 2 bags of ice from McD twice a week. Once on Friday for the weekend and Monday for the week. I add 1 gal water once and I am set. The area around the spigot is much thinner and it sweats some with condensation. I put it a little over the edge so any water drippings hit the concrete floor instead of the wood work bench it sets upon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fun Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great but leaks!
customer_reviews.text: The cooler arrived on time and as described. The wheels are a wonderful addition and make it much easier to take with us. I have a bad back and can pull this to my sons football game. The issue is IT LEAKS! The leak doesn’t happen at the spout but out the top. While pulling the cooler, you lose a bunch of water. I’ve tried not filling to the fill line, a little less...doesn’t matter. If they could fix the seal or something it would be a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly  B

customer_reviews.title: Water, water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a large capacity water container on wheels for car camping. Used on a recent 4 day solo camping outing and over-indulged water use (used to a two gallon container). Washed up, cooked freeze dried meals, did dishes. Had about a gallon remaining by 4th day... love it. Rolled easily through fairly easy terrain. Pretty heavy fully filled and didn’t fit underneath my truck bed cover (too tall), but fit easily in back seat. I would buy again if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold water on the back of a sealing truck, i strap it down and sometimes it spills. it has tipped over and still kept half the water inside. i bought a lock and put it on the cooler incase the locking lid were to break. thusfar, it has been great and the wheels do decent on gravel but on sand, no. I only fill max to 4.5 gallons of wheeling around. worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Review4YOU

customer_reviews.title: Top is not Watertight.
customer_reviews.text: The top is not secure. The Igloo Cooler tipped over, the top flew open breaking off the clasp. The strip of plastic sealing that rings the top flew off as well. Glad the liquid inside was just water. Before it tipped, water seeped out too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was really impressed with this we have used it twice since purchase. We filled it full of gaterade and it was cold for 3 days! The ice was melted after 1 1/2 (it was left outside) it's super sturdy (my kids have sat on it numerous times) the wheel and handle are an amazing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ald

customer_reviews.title: Good when operational
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cooler the few times I was able to use it. The clasp fell off Everytime it was opened. Then flew off while traveling. Now I have a water cooler sitting there unable to use. If they sent me a new clasp I’d give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montecalvo

customer_reviews.title: So much better than hauling 5gal water jugs
customer_reviews.text: We pack water when we go to camp both as a family and with our scout troop. Previously I had a stand which held 5 gallon bottles so girls could easily fill up their water bottles. These coolers are so much better because I can fill them up at home and the Girl Scouts can actually move then. They are easy to use and clean. They are also very sturdy. Seller shipped quickly with no issues with delivery. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Leaky spigot
customer_reviews.text: Leaked from the spigot on the test run in the kitchen. I returned it. Thank goodness I tried it at home with plain water instead of having gatorade leak all over the light beige interior of my car!!!
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMom

customer_reviews.title: The lifted spigot is awesome so you do not have to put it up ...
customer_reviews.text: The flip-lock and lid design are a huge improvement to the old style lid. The lifted spigot is awesome so you do not have to put it up on a table to be able to get yourself a drink. The handle and wheels will be very helpful for transporting when full and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Unskippable

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this cooler. Unfortunately, I had to return it for a refund. After about a weeks use of (water only) the button stared to stick. This resulted in water being poured out continuously for nearly 20 seconds. Watch video!
customer_reviews.author: Familia Shenanigans

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect size and the wheels are a plus. The only issue is that it leaks when tilted on the side. My solution is don't fill it to the top. I try to stay below the 4 quart mark.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t do this but future purchases need to be informed. This product leaks from two different areas in the back and yes it will soak the house no matter how fast you try and get it out of the house. It won’t hold water! Will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Everett

customer_reviews.title: For a marching band...
customer_reviews.text: We got these for the high school marching band during band camp and rehearsal so the kids could refill their water bottles. They've been great because of the wheels! The kids can fill / refill without having to carry or put on a cart. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Duana Cisney

customer_reviews.title: This is not like the ones the coaches have
customer_reviews.text: First one dripped everywhere, second one the handle was broken upon delivery. I changed out the handles and kept the second one. This is not like the ones the coaches have, this is not as strong. But I had to have the wheels - if you're not going to be too rough with it should be okay but the spout is not heavy duty. Not like the Gatorade ones.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicLitKate

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: I ended up not using the coolers for the purpose that I purchased them. They leaked and I was afraid to put them in the vehicle and ruin the inside of the vehicle if they accidently tipped over
customer_reviews.author: yours truly

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars! Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. I ordered this for a youth ministry event and today was the first time we used this. It leaks and is unusable. Water comes out from all angles from around the spout. I’m frustrated at the waste of money and the unusable cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best beverage cooler I have bought. For my business, we do many catering service. We have try many other branded items before, but this stands out the most. It’s great for catering service easy to clean and transport. Cons: need a better seal. If you don’t put some plastic films by the top, it’s going to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for tennis sessions out hot
customer_reviews.text: Put ice, water, and your tennis session will be the best one! Easy to transport... but the wheels are not made for rough streets.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot and cold items in large quantities

customer_reviews.author: mmightymite

customer_reviews.title: Nice ice or water hauler

customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This saves me a lot of money on hot days working outside by not having to buy bottled water anymore.
customer_reviews.text: The price was lower than I was expecting to pay and the description matched the product I was looking for so I made the purchase and the product arrived in a timely manner. Once I opened the packaging and inspected the cooler, I found it to be what I expected and it matched the listing perfectly, so I call it a good business transaction. I am very pleased with this transaction and would refer the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: milesfullofsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Works great for hot beverages too
customer_reviews.text: Used this for hot chocolate for a soccer team. It kept warm for hours, was easy to roll, and was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn N

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship. Excellent cooler.

customer_reviews.author: JOHN COMINSKY

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great
customer_reviews.text: So far, so great. Worked for a camping trip which was my main intent. Will try it out for soccer games. No leakage here
customer_reviews.author: S. Whicker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lid and seal
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, but this one deserved it. Yes, it keeps stuff cold for hours in the sun. It gets 2 stars for that. But the lid pops off the “hinge” too easily and the seal is like a long string of rubber that doesn’t stay in the groves. We’re constantly fighting to keep it in place just to shut it. Plus it leaks from the top. I expected more from Igloo.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Pitre

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. I previously had one and it lasted for 7 years. The only issue I ever had was the seal on the inside would occasionally come loose. I would just reinsert it back into the hole. It has been a great cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Rocko III

customer_reviews.title: Great water cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been dragging this to many baseball tournaments this season to have in Dugout for 10 year old boys and it has done great. Wish there was maybe a cup holder and it does splash out the top if you have filled it to the brim when you are pulling it behind you so keep that in mind and don’t tilt it too much. But it does exactly the job I wanted it to do and lasts through the game.
customer_reviews.author: Gjcomom

customer_reviews.title: Gap in seal.
customer_reviews.text: This thing would be great if it didn’t have a huge gap in the lid making transport of a full container impossible. I’m sure there’s some purpose for it, but it’s not worth the issues it causes.
customer_reviews.author: Sammik

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Sport Roller Beverage Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Useless outside for my business and it lasts all day. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed just like the other reviewers that the seal on this cooler doesn’t work worth a hoot. I filled it with ice water, clamped down the lid and set it in the passenger seat of my truck. Before I knew it, water had sloshed out and soaked my seat. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: mattymointx

customer_reviews.title: Great coolers for camping.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the rolling wheels. We bought two and took them camping. One we put tea and ice in and the other just filled with ice. They worked well.

customer_reviews.title: For the price is an awesome product. Some other products are very expensive
customer_reviews.text: For the price is an awesome product. Some other products are very expensive.It not for heavy duty use just for a day at the park. For the price it dose it job. Had one before this one use it for two year for more the 100 day a year for practice and it work fine.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible item
customer_reviews.text: Did not seal, so water spilled everywhere — as we were walking: looked like a snail trail behind me. In my van — water, water everywhere! Horrible item.
customer_reviews.author: lauralee.c

customer_reviews.title: Gatorade all over your car
customer_reviews.text: If you want 5 gallons of Gatorade all over the inside of your car, this is the cooler for you! I bought this to take drinks to an all day volleyball tournament. The cooler is sturdy and it does wheel around ok. The problem is that it does not seal AT ALL. When you tip the cooler to wheel it around, it leaks. Even just minor sloshing leaks. I thought since it was made in America, it would be better quality. While it is study, the lid is a major, deal ending, design flaw
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is perfect! I use it for our teams water throughout the year since I coach multiple sports teams and it's super convenient since I am able to roll it on and off the field. I also love it because it can keep our water cold all day long even in the warmest weather whenever we participate in any tournaments. I really recommend this cooler for any occasion.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Took a drink to the beach for sand soccer, sat on the beach all day and then drove home 3 hours and I still had ice in it. Great cooler and will continue to use it for soccer events!

customer_reviews.title: Bad seal design!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with igloo name and this cooler. The cooler does not have a seal ring all the way around the top, so when transporting in vehicle or rolling it spills water out. If I didnt need it for my team daily this summer I'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael. A. Gaugler

customer_reviews.title: Product latches broken and one missing

I received one with no latch or gasket, and the second one came with a broken latch. I can understand one with a problem but not two. The package came perfectly intact so it was the seller not the product. I needed them in a hurry so I have tied the lids closed to get by. I'm very disappointed in the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen A.

customer_reviews.title: This will leak...

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they are upright

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Though the product is great, the quality is not, unless I was unlucky to receive a faulty piece. We took the beverage cooler out to a picnic and upon arriving at the site we discovered that a part of the nozzle had broken off so it was leaking our beverage. For an outdoor item like that it needs to be built stronger. I would really hope for a replacement.
